title: Student Engagement Strategy Design in Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and job-related social domain knowledge
context.additional_context: BYOD-based asynchronous learning course strengthening practical skills across social sectors. Participants include professionals (medical/legal/technical) who must master effective engagement strategies in hybrid settings

learning_goals: Learners actively contribute opinions at least twice weekly in asynchronous discussions on the LMS (Learning Management System).
Learners utilize online collaboration tools to design and establish implementation plans for team projects.
Learners improve their learning activities at least twice by incorporating formative assessment feedback in a blended learning environment.
Learners engage in meaningful interactions with instructors and peers at least once monthly via digital communication methods.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
